common.no_clans_found:
No clans were found on this server for the specified input! 
Use {{command}} command to link a clan.
common.no_clans_linked:
No clans are linked to this server. Why not link some? 
Use {{command}} command to link a clan.
common.clan_limit:
The maximum number of clans has reached. Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to add more than two clans.

Already a patron? Use {{command}} command.
common.patron_only:
This command is only available on Patron servers. Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to use this command.

Already a patron? Use {{command}} command.
common.clan_verification:
We need to ensure that you are a leader or co-leader of this clan. Please verify your player account with the API token.
Use the {{command}} command to verify your player account. The API token is available in the Game settings.
common.no_option: Algo salió mal al ejecutar este comando. (Opción no encontrada)
common.no_data: No hay información disponible por el momento. ¡Todavía estamos recolectando!
common.no_clan_data: No hay información acerca de {{clan}}. ¡Todavía estamos recolectando!
common.fetch_failed: Algo salió mal mientras buscábamos información desde la API.

component.expired: Este componente ya no se encuentra activo. Vuelva a ejecutar el comando.
component.unauthorized: ¡Debes ejecutar el comando para poder interactuar con los componentes.

common.no_clan_tag_first_time: You must provide a clan tag to execute this command!
common.no_clan_tag:
You must provide a clan tag to execute this command! 
Alternatively, you can link a default clan to your profile using the {{command}} command.
common.no_player_tag:
You must provide a player tag to execute this command!, 
Alternatively, you can link some accounts to your profile using the {{command}} command.
common.clan_not_linked:
No clan is linked to {{user}}. 
Use {{command}} to link a clan.
common.player_not_linked: No player is linked to {{user}}. Use {{command}} command to link a player.
common.guild_unauthorized: This server is not authorized for {{clan}}. Use {{command}} command to link a clan.

status_code.400: Error 400: El cliente ha proporcionado parámetros incorrectos durante la solicitud.
status_code.403: Error 403: El token API no puede otorgar acceso al recurso solicitado.
status_code.404: Error 404: No se encontraron resultados para la etiqueta proporcionada.
status_code.429: La solicitud fue limitada porque el número de solicitudes superó el límite definido para el token API utilizado.
status_code.500: Error 500: Ocurrió un error desconocido al gestionar la solicitud.
status_code.503: Service is temporarily unavailable because of maintenance break in the game.
